  3. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  4. from cms.plugins.picture.models import Picture
  5. from django.conf import settings
  7. class PicturePlugin(CMSPluginBase):
  8. model = Picture
  9. name = _("Picture")
  10. render_template = "cms/plugins/picture.html"
  11. text_enabled = True
  13. def render(self, context, instance, placeholder):
  14. if instance.url:
  15. link = instance.url
  16. elif instance.page_link:
  17. link = instance.page_link.get_absolute_url()
  18. else:
  19. link = ""
  20. context.update({
  21. 'picture': instance,
  22. 'link': link,
  23. 'placeholder': placeholder
  24. })
